docs.snippet: While other music outlets struggle, the satellite-radio network is a success story. However, the Internet-connected car will pose a challenge....
docs.lead_paragraph: While other music outlets struggle, the satellite-radio network is a success story. However, the Internet-connected car will pose a challenge.
docs.abstract: Sirius XM faces uncertain future as automobile industry moves closer to standardizing Internet-connected cars; majority of Sirius subscribers connect through their vehicles, but Internet-connected drivers would have wide range of free alternatives; company emphasizes that exclusive content and wide-range of offerings will give it edge over free services.

headline.main: SiriusXM Fights to Dominate the Dashboard of the Connected Car
headline.print_headline: SiriusXM Fights to Dominate the Dashboard
